body: This isn’t yuri, I saw the artist twitter and it’s genderbender. They show the male self of the blonde boy.
Why does so much yuri have to be like this? They have sex scenes but you don't SEE what going on.
I can't tell what's going on, but there seems to both Yuri and Futanari in here.  Should maybe tag those.  Art's pretty cute, too.
